topics.name: Cyclical Time
topics.content: Time is not linear but cyclical - events repeat in patterns through the Long Count
topics.trading_insight: Historical patterns repeat. Cycle analysis is the Mayan edge. What happened before will happen again.

topics.name: Cosmic Order
topics.content: Human affairs mirror celestial movements - as above, so below
topics.trading_insight: Macro influences micro. Fed decisions move BTC. Understand the cosmos (macro) to predict earth (price).

topics.name: Balance of Forces
topics.content: Maintaining balance between opposing forces - light and dark, creation and destruction
topics.trading_insight: Risk/reward balance. Portfolio equilibrium. The Mayans knew: Excess invites correction.

topics.name: Tzolkin Sacred Calendar
topics.content: 260-day cycle of 20 day names and 13 numbers for sacred timing
topics.trading_insight: Short-term cycle timing. Some days are auspicious for trading, others for rest.

topics.name: Haab Solar Calendar
topics.content: 365-day solar calendar with 18 months of 20 days plus 5 Wayeb unlucky days
topics.trading_insight: Annual cycle alignment. Respect the Wayeb - dangerous days require caution (like FOMC weeks).

topics.name: Long Count Prophecy
topics.content: The Great Cycle of 5,125 years enabling long-term pattern recognition
topics.trading_insight: Super-cycles exist. The Mayans tracked them. Bitcoin's halving is a Long Count event.

topics.name: Kukulkan's Descent
topics.content: At equinox, the feathered serpent descends the pyramid of Chichen Itza
topics.trading_insight: Equinox moments in markets - balance points before directional moves. Watch for the serpent.

topics.name: Cenote Depths
topics.content: Sacred cenotes as portals to the underworld, places of offering and revelation
topics.trading_insight: Drawdowns are cenote journeys. Descend with offerings (stop losses), emerge with wisdom.
